trustfund:
TF020537-BHZ - PUBLIC FINANCE STRUCTURAL
            ADJUSTMENT CREDIT PROJECT-PFSAC,TF029670-PHRD-GOVERNMENT SERVICES PROJECT,TF029669-PHRD-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT PROGRAM,TF020901-COFINANCING TRANSITION
            ASSISTANCE CREDIT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Public Finance
            Structural Adjustment Credit Project is to support the
            establishment of public finance structures and
            implementation of reform policies at the State and Entity
            levels. The components include: (a) securing financing of
            the State through the preparation and adoption of the
            budgets of the State and the Entity government and through
            the development and implementation of a transfer mechanism
            that would provide a regular and predictable flow of funds
            to the State budget for meeting its obligations; (b)
            development of a debt management capacity in Bosnia and
            Herzegovina; (c) administrative reforms to improve
            efficiency and transparency of government budgetary
            operations; (d) initiation of reform and harmonization of
            tax policies and administration within Bosnia and
            Herzegovina; and (e) initiation of reform in the pension system.
